item.title: Python
item.description: library(reticulate) use_python("/usr/local/bin/python3") Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON="/usr/local/bin/python3") #py_install("pandas") import pandas as pd faithful=pd.read_csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/datasets/faithful.csv") faithful.max() ## Unnamed: 0 272.0 ## eruptions 5.1 ## waiting 96.0 ## dtype: float64 faithful.min() ## Unnamed: 0 1.0 ## eruptions 1.6 ## waiting 43.0 ## dtype: float64 print('The minimum value on eruptions is',faithful.eruptions.min()) ## The minimum value on eruptions is 1.6 print('The minimum value on waiting is',faithful.waiting.min()) ## The minimum value on waiting is 43 print('The maximum value on eruptions is',faithful.
